website_summaries.verdict: Simple, lightweight design in one of the least expensive dog wheelchairs around.
pros: Uses a mix of lightweight aluminum and stainless steel hardware in the frame to provide durability
Can select from multiple sizes to find the right fit for small dogs
Frame is adjustable in terms of height, length, and width to provide a better fit
cons: Adjustment knobs and screws will likely loosen over time

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! When we put them on our dog, who has lost use of his back legs, he is very happy and mobile. I recommend these wheels very highly. They were the best thing to happen to our little dog after he lost use of his back legs. We love these!
customer_reviews.author: Svengali

customer_reviews.title: This wheelchair was a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This wheelchair has changed my dogs life and our family’s life. Our 13 year old pug had lost the use of her two back legs. I decided to give this wheelchair a try and it changed everything. She loves her wheelchair, her spirit soars when she’s in it. The wheelchair is completely adjustable and so well engineered and can perform on versatile terrain. If your dog has limited or loss of use of one or both of their back legs, this wheelchair is a must. She’s now 14 and we walk an average of 2 miles per day.
customer_reviews.author: Low-Chuleta

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! My Yorkie is 6 lbs and fits great in this wheelchair. It took about 2 weeks for him to get used to it, but now he runs like the wind in his chair! It's amazing to see him have such mobility again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Zaayer

customer_reviews.title: I felt it was well built but it wasn't a good fit for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but my dog didn't, it was just too scary. I sent it back because my vet said it wouldn't work well for my dogs condition. I do feel it was a good product, seemed to be well made. My only complaint was that the height adjustment was not good. The holes in the metal should be punched through otherwise the wheels slip up and down. That was the scary part. I've never purchased a product with adjustable height that didn't have holes, this has just indentations.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This device restored mobility to my aging Bichon Frise who has lost much of the use of his back legs. The device appears to be well-made and durable, although it requires some maintenance (tightening the fasteners periodically - tool is included). Ziggy adjusted to the device almost immediately. He goes down stairs, across curbs and into grass, all without much hesitation. I recommend this device for use by dog lovers.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The seller was excellent in allowing me to return the item hassle-free and ...
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old cat was no longer able to use his back legs - I purchased this to try to see if this would help his quality of life. Unfortunately, my cat was in serious pain due to advanced arthritis and was more ill than I knew. I returned the item as my cat sadly passed away. The seller was excellent in allowing me to return the item hassle-free and I have received my credit. I liked the wheelchair - it was easy to put together and even easier to adjust. I wish my cat had been healthy enough to use it. I believe this wheelchair can be very beneficial for disabled pets.
customer_reviews.author: AnaO

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more simple! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was simple to assemble, easy to adjust and was the perfect size! It is exactly as advertied. I opened the package and my dog was in it and walking in 10 mins. If I ever need another one, I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: jborck

customer_reviews.title: ... about a year now and drags himself around the happiest handicapped dog you've ever seen but I knew he ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this wheelchair for our 14 pound pekingese he has been paralyzed for just about a year now and drags himself around the happiest handicapped dog you've ever seen but I knew he needed to run so when I saw this chair was afordable we ordered it got it today and may I say he is loving life after getting through the tightening up stage with the screws in the adjustment bars after that smooth sailing its lightweight perfect for what we need thank you so much Amazon for carrying this
customer_reviews.author: eleanor murphy

customer_reviews.title: This fit her pretty well, its adjustable over a range but unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell/Chihuahua mysteriously lost the use of her hind legs. This fit her pretty well, its adjustable over a range but unfortunately that means extra length will stick out. I suppose I could cut the rods off and then file them smooth to customize it to her size. She didn't do much at first but over the last couple months she has been gaining strength and now runs around in circles while I'm putting food in her bowl just as she did before her legs stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Asa B. Spade

customer_reviews.title: This was excellent for my senior dog
customer_reviews.text: This was excellent for my senior dog, who was having difficulty walking on smooth surfaces, such as tile. It was easy to adjust to the right size, although took a few tries for him to have a comfortable range of motion for his rear legs to walk. A word of caution: The rear leg supports will chafe if the dog rubs against them too much. I covered mine in a really soft fabric, which alleviated the problem. The great thing is that this wheelchair is fully adjustable and very good quality. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: stnole

customer_reviews.title: Freedom for my little guy.
customer_reviews.text: My little guy is doing so much better. I know the price seems outragious. Well it is. But I have found it to be worth the cost. It is adjustable in every direction. Super light weight. Very well made. After it was completly adjusted to fit I would put him in it for an hour or so and stay with him the whole time after a few days he was running around like a champ. He actually likes it now?
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S

customer_reviews.title: Over Priced
customer_reviews.text: The alum. frame is fairly good quality. The back leg harness is very cheap and not very comfortable for the dog. The wheels a very cheap and noisy and do not have bearings.They should use rubber. The instructions are a joke. No picture with a dog and the picture they do show is not even the unit they sell. Very over priced for what you get. They are making a huge profit on this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find something else
customer_reviews.text: Small screws keep coming loose and falling out. The rubber protective tips that also keep the thing from coming apart fall off easily and are hard to find after the fact. The wheel adjustment screws which allow you to raise or lower the wheels don't hold very well. If you overtighten them you can't easily loosen them up. It's just not well made and is not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: David Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The bars bent!!! Not even 2 hours worn!!! all the parts keep falling off. It’s not good quality. And I wasted my money........
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy to have a great invention but the craftmanship needs ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to have a great invention but the craftmanship needs to be worked on. It has fallen apart and I have had to keep putting it back together. But, all in all as for my pet I am very happy to see him up and moving aroung again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Williams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adjustments do not stay, My dog goes backwards instead of forward, the front strap falls down.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gough

customer_reviews.title: They see me rollin’ they hatin’
customer_reviews.text: Little confusing at first but works great. I have one happy pig dog!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Moldenhauer

customer_reviews.title: DOG WALKS!!
customer_reviews.text: MY 12 YEAR OLD WAS DIAGNOSED WITH OSTEOSARCOMA IN HIS SPINE. THIS LEFT HIM UNABLE TO USE HIS BACK LEGS. I CARRIED HIM EVERYWHERE AND ORDERED A HARNESS TO HELP HIM WALK--WHICH WAS OK--THEN ORDERED THE WHEELCHAIR AND HE IS ABLE TO WALK AROUND THE HOUSE AND GO ON WALKS WITH ME. THIS HAS MADE ME SOOO HAPPY AND HE LOVES TO BE ABLE TO MOVE AGAIN!!! IT GAVE HIM SOME OF HIS INDEPENDENCE BACK AND I RECOMMEND THIS TO ANYONE WHO HAS A DOG WITH REAR LEG PROBLEMS.
customer_reviews.author: jf

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my large paralyzed cat. He weighs ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my large paralyzed cat. He weighs about 13 lbs and this fits him. It's a tad short between the neck and the rear, but it does come with two sizes of straps. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Poplin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and easy to assemble. Unfortunately I got the sizing wrong and customer service was very helpful with the return. I highly recommend this product. I do advise that if you have a unique sizing breed of dog do not base yourself just with the size. Example, I have a bulldog and the height was not enough to determine the size. I recommend you contact the seller for help before you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size XS for my pug, whose back legs have recently gotten very weak. It was pretty easy to figure out as far as setup, and it's been a huge help. Really amazing improvement in his quality of life for a relatively small sum of money!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ross

customer_reviews.title: Not for tea cup size dog
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy appliance however it was too big for my 5 pound Yorkie, had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: LynneVen

customer_reviews.title: It works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has arthritis in his hips and can't use his back legs. We had a pet stroller and he hated it but he is scared to death of everything so it took us 2 months to buy this. The first night we took him out in it he loved it! He can run, go up and down curbs and walk through grass. This has made him a very happy dog!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My sweet little dog
customer_reviews.text: My sweet little dog, picked up on how to operate pretty quick...She was soooooooooooo happy to be able to move around again and her personality (when she's in it)is back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Terrasita

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Dog Wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: After looking on the net for several days, I decided on this wheelchair, it took several different tries for my little dog to try the chair without a fight, now he looks forward to the walks, also the other dogs have no problem walking along side of the wheelchair. The price was really good for my budget. The wheelchair is well built, and I'm able to carry him in the chair while crossing the buzzy highway. I hope this helps fellow animal lovers. Thank You, Hotelleslie2@aol.com
customer_reviews.author: hotelleslie2@aol

customer_reviews.title: hmmmmm, not again.
customer_reviews.text: Poor design, always having to tighten it. Harness is very odd to put on the dog, especially if they are already struggling.
customer_reviews.author: ROC Mayor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. However, it appears to be rather overpriced, for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: John Wilbur Williams

customer_reviews.title: i'm sure this is a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't open the box yet..i didn't even try it on my dog....he pass away the same day i received the dog wheelchair.... i'm sure this is a wonderful product..thank you...
customer_reviews.author: ZF

customer_reviews.title: Great for therapy!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our mini dachshund (Bacon). He is a country dog,10ft tall and bullet proof ! Until he jumped off the arm of the couch one to many times and pitched a nerve (vertebra # 4) middle to lower above his hips. He lost use of his back legs, but vet said the nerves were still active. If he got worse then a wheelchair would be in his future! So when we got home I got on Amazon & seen that they are also good for therapy! Boy did it! He has gotten better! Not 100% but able to get around and even chase the cat & grand baby! Lol
customer_reviews.author: holly mccrady

customer_reviews.title: Well designed dog wheelchair gives hope
customer_reviews.text: Our shi-tsu lost feeling in his rear legs & the wheelchair has been great. He is starting to use his back legs again & this helps him build up strength. Hopefully he will regain mobility & vets be damned who suggested putting him down at mid life.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dennis

customer_reviews.title: doggie wheel chair
customer_reviews.text: It is great but little bumper bars in front of the wheels to keep from getting stuck on door jams and ect. The set screws on the wheels come loose but I will fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Loss of Legs
customer_reviews.text: It helped out our paralyzed chihuahua of 7 lbs, very easy to put together and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Le Lapin Blanc

customer_reviews.title: My little girl hates but I love it she can get around much better and doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: My little girl hates but I love it she can get around much better and doesn't have to drag her back end. After a few weeks it has helped her to start walking a little she hates me putting her in it so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Dachshund has not been able to use hind legs for over two years, this is excellent!! He runs around the house with no worries! This wheelchair gives him his spirit back!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to adjust. Now, if only I can get my cat to stay in it!!
customer_reviews.author: yamyam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, not difficult to assemble and works well for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item works as described 8 lb dog , scoots around house like no tomorrow!!
customer_reviews.author: Tractor Boy

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Bought it for my weiner dog and she got it right away! Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: jennaboo

customer_reviews.title: Light and Reasonably Priced
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for our mini Dachshund. Allowed him to get around while recovering from ruptured disk. A lot lighter and less $ than the one the vet offered.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew V.

customer_reviews.title: Zoom Zoom!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Mom's dog who is old and unable to walk. With some time and practice she is mobile and happy again!
customer_reviews.author: Daisydaze

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor workmanship. Completely bent when taken out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: No instructions. Extremely poor workmanship. Completely bent when taken out of the box. Does not function as stated. Literally falls apart / comes loose within minutes of use and continues to do so no matter how tightly the fasteners are secured. We had high hopes for this product, but could not be more disappointed than we are. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Giving back mobility to my little buddy!
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for my 14 year old Pekingese Jubei. She's had two back surgeries for disc issues and as a result has weaker hind legs. While she can get up and walk on her own, it's not easy for her as she has gotten older. While this did come assembled, it was "upside down". Once I fixed that and made some adjustments for fit, she took to it instantly!! It was wonderful to see her cruising around with out plopping down when her hind legs would waver a little. According to the website , they are supposed to be able to "go" while using this, but we haven't test that just yet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tweak89

customer_reviews.title: Great design, completely adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This doggie wheelchair worked just right. Be sure to make the measurements of your canine before you order—there are 4 or 5 sizes. I took these wheels along to my veterinarian along with pooch, and she adjusted it and made sure he was okay walking around. It has given our doggie great mobility after having become paralyzed in the back end. Even though this is one of the less-expensive models out there, I'd recommend taking a serious look at is. It's returnable, so if it just doesn't work out, you can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure my 17 1/2 Papillon would adjust to the chair but I was surprised. It is lightweight and he loves it now that he can run after the younger dog. The first chair they sent was obviously a return as the screws had been stripped but they sent me a new one the next day so he could get mobile immediately! Awsome product! It is heartwarming to see him active again!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Papillon

customer_reviews.title: I could not give a good review since my dog was never able to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not give a good review since my dog was never able to use this product. My dog did not want to get inside of the wheelchair so we never used it. I kept it hoping my dog would give in. My dog just recently passed away. So if you order this, be sure that your dog will like it before the month deadline to return. (Has to be returned within a month). Product looks real sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: nice product serves its
customer_reviews.text: Works as it is supposed too, nice product serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: K9saver

customer_reviews.title: She became mobile again and enjoyed walking without any apparent discomfort
customer_reviews.text: The wheelchair worked out extremely well. Our pet (Sweetie) adjusted to it immediately, the first time in it actually. She became mobile again and enjoyed walking without any apparent discomfort. Unfortunately she passed away shortly after we purchased the item.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Hanson

customer_reviews.title: ... is a little complicated but once is ready is perfect..
customer_reviews.text: It is a little complicated but once is ready is perfect...
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Elderly dog legs were too weak to build up strength ...
customer_reviews.text: Elderly dog legs were too weak to build up strength to use this product. Manufacturer does have a helpful video on YouTube for reference which was better than the written directions. Very difficult to put on with one person.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Dog Wheel Chair X-small reordered
customer_reviews.text: Thanks I had little difficulty exchanging the one I ordered before I received this one fits perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: Richard. L Mose

customer_reviews.title: Dog used it immediately- took to it right away! ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog used it immediately- took to it right away!!! -has to be adjusted often- but allows our dog to be mobil!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Saurman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it didn't work for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great it fit but was too late my dog passed away 2 hrs before it got here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Yes the price is great, however it took forever to put it together. The description on sizing is off. My dog is considered a small dog that can fit on your lap however when I first ordered a small, it fit more like a large Beagle. I had to return it for an x-small. If you have a tea cup or puppy this is not for you. The only positive is the price. It's significantly cheaper than most wheelchairs. The wheels are also plastic so it's more for grass.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Use lock tight on the screws and you will have no problems with them coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: scott stewart

customer_reviews.title: I needed to return. It was too large for ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to return. It was too large for my dog. Was able to send back hassle free!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this chair, and he can move again!
customer_reviews.author: Jerson Morales

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this purchase...it is well built and relatively easy to use...the only problem I have is the side adjustments can loosen and you have to keep tightening it....otherwise my dachshund has his freedom to get around without dragging and hurting himself. Thanks so much for providing this option!
customer_reviews.author: paula jurich

customer_reviews.title: Randi time with w/c
customer_reviews.text: Our Randi did very well with the chair, gave her the freedom to get around the house by herself safely. She was only able to enjoy it for 3 months, but when she was in the chair she had the sparkle in her eyes.
customer_reviews.author: madonna mikaitid

customer_reviews.title: its Ok my dog doenn't like it trying to spend time withher to learn how ...
customer_reviews.text: its Ok my dog doenn't like it trying to spend time withher to learn how to use, but not having any luck so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hinson

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: it is a great product,but i had mickeys hip operated on and put back in place.thank you ,i have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: pom35

customer_reviews.title: Let Down in a box
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy and does not function easy for an already injured pet. Claims to be supportive and helpful for injuries. In actuality there is no support for the pet and can be counter productive to rehabilitation.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rogers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product was not worth the money difficult to put on my dog needs 2 people
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend another model even though it would cost more
customer_reviews.text: Directions not clear.Dificult to adjust to dog. Would recommend another model even though it would cost more.
customer_reviews.author: Oren Delzer

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the doggy wheelchair for our 7 year old miniature dachshund that had some how injured her back causing paralysis to her back legs. Dazzle unfortunately never had the chance to use the wheelchair and passed away 1 week after her injury; the box had not even been opened and when I contacted the company explaining that the wheelchair needed to be returned the company was very courteous in responding and the return process was painless. They were quick to credit my amazon account.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Dillard

product_meta.title: Best Friend Mobility Extra Small Dog Wheelchair
product_meta.description:
Size:Extra SmallWe’ve got your back! Literally!

With a little help from their friends, our furry pals can do more than just get by, they can continue to enjoy life. That’s exactly what the Best Friend Mobility rear support dog wheelchair is for.

Made from lightweight aluminum non-rust alloy with all-terrain pneumatic wheels. This dog wheelchair also features padded shoulder support, double-thronged adjustable neoprene shoulder harness, and built-in adjustable double rear padded harness. Both male and female dogs will have no problems relieving themselves comfortably even while on the pet wheelchair.

*Your pet should have full front leg strength to use this cart. 

Specs: 
•Lightweight adjustable aluminum frame (non-rust) 
•Non-rust stainless hardware—very simple and quick assembly
•Deluxe neoprene front and rear harness for complete comfort
•Designed and tested by K9 Orthopaedic surgeon
•Easy hex wrench adjustment of height, length, and width
•Pet can use the cart for assisted walking or full rear leg support—with zero rear leg weight bearing
•Allows pet to use the bathroom while in cart
•All terrain polyurethane wheels with sealed bearings
•Easy clip-on function front harness system

This cart is good for: 
•Hip Dysplasia (Although Surgery can often times fix this so you may not need a cart)
•Arthritis•Rehabilitation
•Nuerological problems like osteomyelitis or degenerative myelopathy
•Fractured spine/back
•Rear limb amputee
•Ligamentous injury like PCL or ACL
•Thoracic or Lumbar disc injury
•Any other condition that results in rear leg pain or weakness
feature_bullets: Easy to adjust height, length, and width with a hex wrench
All terrain polyurethane wheels with sealed bearings
Easy clip on function of the front harness system
Pet can use the cart for assisted walking or full rear leg support with no rear leg weight bearing

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
